Text: Hi Cc Hi Shelley Thanks for your message The best way to reach me is really at work this address but I do check the home account a few times a week Anyway how are you It must be wierd seeing your own company in the news everyday Kim said that you were in a good spot to rebound if you needed to when the dust settles That is a relief to us As far as the adoption stuffwe still have a long way to go Our home study is being written up this week weve finished the interviews and have all of our documents into the social worker We are hopefully going to get notification from the INS to get our fingerprints done within the next week or so Were hoping the INS stuff goes quickly because that is really the only major thing we have left to get done We dont know where in Kazakhstan were gonna go yet but we are about a month from getting our name on the referral list well probably find out possible locations then I dont know how much Kim relayed to you but were hoping for a healthy infant and the rest doesnt matter as far as preferences We are pretty excited already How is Alina spelling Kims description of her sounds wonderful You guys must be having a terrific time getting to know each other again after a few months separation Lets definitely stay in touch Maybe the next time you come through DC we can have you over or meet somewhere Anyway say hi to everyone for us Love Kurt w h Lisa and Kurt Schier Park Road NW Washington DC
